name: AK Tokens #1 - 2021/10 - The Hunt
description:
These Tokens are a collab between funhousenfts and myself (akwelz).

I started in the NFT space in July 2021, and I find it very hard to identify artists that, above and beyond the hype, have something to share.

That something, an emotion, a feeling, something that made my life a little bit different after I was exposed to their art.


Also, artists that were humble enough despite their follower count, to answer their DM's with kindness and generosity.


___
AK Tokens #1, 10 tokens that reward 10 artists I value from my heart since in joined the HEN and Tezos blockchain community.
___
To the beholder of the token, this is a token of gratitude and appreciation.
I humbly recognize that your art brought some change in my life.

So the only thing I can give you, because I am terrible at art, is give you as a token of gratitude, a bit of my time.

These tokens also provide you with 1h free "marketing" consultancy with me / because marketing is my job and I want to provide help.
I am terrible at art. I am not that bad at marketing.

You can swap the token if you so wish. I added a "high" royalty fee however to make sure that you choose carefully with whom you want to swap your token.

How to ?
Ping me on twitter, grab time in my calendar and join me on a call.
During the call you will have to burn your token.
You will receive another one in its stead.
___

funhousenfts accepted to draw the AK Tokens for me. Thank you my friend. A friend I met on twitter in the NFT space.
Visit his profile.
Share his art.
Art name : Token Mustard.jpeg 413*604px 
Hand drawn
